Question
========
When different resistors are connected in series, it is true that

Answerlist
----------
* the same current flows in each one.
* the potential difference across each is the same.
* the power dissipated in each is the same.
* the total resistance is equal to the greatest resistance of any individual resistor.


Solution
========
The current is the same in resistors in series.
